page.title: 17Lieblings, Fordham.
page.content: This bungalow is on the edge of Fordham. It was finished in December 1983.The owners have lived there for 19 months. The bungalow is built of brick and it has pantiles on the roof. There is polystyrene slab insulation in the walls and the roof is insulated. There is oil central heating with special radiators. They are very small but they give out a lot of heat. They have a sheet of metal in front of them so people do not get burnt. The windows of the house are double glazed. There are 8 rooms: kitchen/ dining room, 3 bedrooms, lounge, bathroom, shower room and utility room. Outside there is a garden front and back and a tarmac drive. There is a double garage and a patio and cloakroom.The dog has a brick kennel outside. Four people live in the bungalow.
